      • createQuestionnaire

        public void createQuestionnaire(eu.operando.core.cpcu.servlet.configurations.QuestionnaireConfiguration qc)
                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                java.io.IOException,
                                eu.operando.core.cpcu.exceptions.ConfigNotInitialised,
                                org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Creates the questionnaire from the QuestionnaireConfiguration passed, and writes it to the Question Config file. JSON Simple parser doesn't parameterise it's implementation, so have to deal with type warnings.
        Parameters:
        qc - the QuestionnaireConfiguration
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - the file not found exception
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - the parse exception
        eu.operando.core.cpcu.exceptions.ConfigNotInitialised

                        eu.operando.core.cpcu.servlet.configurations.QuestionConfiguration qc)

        Adds the question to a given Questionnaire. the ID identifies the Questionnaire, and the QuestionConfiguration outlines the fields of the Question.

        id - the id of the Questionnaire to be added to
        qc - the QuestionConfiguration to be added

        java.lang.Exception - the exception

      • updateQuestion

        public boolean updateQuestion(int id,
                              int questionid,
                              eu.operando.core.cpcu.servlet.configurations.QuestionConfiguration qc)
                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                              java.io.IOException,
                              org.json.simple.parser.ParseException,
                              java.lang.Exception
        Updates a question. Must be a FULL configuration.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the Questionnaire
        questionid - the ID of the question within the Questionnaire
        qc - the QuestionConfiguration to update.
        Returns:
        true, if successful
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - the file not found exception
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - the parse exception
        java.lang.Exception - the exception
